definition: currency unit (esp. Chinese yuan)/first/original/primary/fundamental/constituent/part/era (of a reign)/meta- (prefix)/(math.) argument/variable/(Tw) (geology) eon
surname Yuan/the Yuan or Mongol dynasty (1279-1368)
dawn/morning/daybreak/day/dan, female roles in Chinese opera (traditionally played by specialized male actors)

sentences.english: This New Year's day, I had a really happy.
sentences.chinese: 這個元旦節，我過得真快樂。

sentences.english: In order to let everybody one happier New Year's Day festival.
sentences.chinese: 爲了讓大家過一個更愉快的元旦節。

sentences.english: During the New Year's holiday, Hunan Province's tourism market welcomed a heat.
sentences.chinese: 元旦小長假，我省旅遊市場在陽光的催動下開始發熱。

sentences.english: This is my New Year's Day, don't have a good time.
sentences.chinese: 這就是我元旦節的一天，不愉快的一天。

sentences.english: It was New Year's Eve and the snowed streets were deserted.
sentences.chinese: 這是元旦夜和雪的街道空無一人。

sentences.english: Good luck in the year of the monkey, happy New Year.
sentences.chinese: 好運在猴年，快樂過元旦。

sentences.english: They also have Christmas to New Year’s, Easter and Thanksgiving holidays.
sentences.chinese: 他們還有聖誕節至元旦，復活節和感恩節假日。

sentences.english: New Year's Day we celebrate the Chinese New Year.
sentences.chinese: 元旦節，我們慶祝中國農曆新年。

sentences.english: A few seconds after midnight on New Year’s Eve, 2010.
On New Year's day, and also my three chiam's birthday.
sentences.chinese: 元旦節那天，也是我三姨的生日。

sentences.english: Is a compound word , made up of two words.
sentences.chinese: 元旦是一個合成詞，由兩個字組成。

sentences.english: New Year's Day is a public holiday throughout Britain.
sentences.chinese: 元旦節在英國的全部地區都算是國定假日。

sentences.english: New Year's Day party started, and Ning-Ling and Zhou Zhengyang come for a very boring speech.
sentences.chinese: 元旦晚會開始了，寧和周正陽來了一次很無聊的演講。

sentences.english: He job-hopped to establish Zhonghua Book Company on the New Years Day of 1912.
sentences.chinese: 1912年元旦，他從商務“跳槽”而創辦中華書局。

sentences.english: For that reason, the Dutch believe that eating donuts on New Year's Day will bring good fortune.
sentences.chinese: 爲此，荷蘭人相信在元旦那天喫多娜圈會帶來好運。
今天是一九七九年元旦。

definition: Lantern Festival, the final event of the Spring Festival 春節|春节, on 15th of first month of the lunar calendar
to have a holiday or vacation
to step into the new year/New Year
